subject: Hibernate-Error in JUnit-Test
msgSnippet: Hi, I tried to make a test with a class, which calls in its constructor some functions, which load data out of the database using hibernate. When I do that, I
messageBody:
Hi,

I tried to make a test with a class, which calls in its constructor
some functions, which load data out of the database using hibernate.
When I do that, I get the exception-message:
Java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError
at HibernateSessionFactory.<clinit>

and the code there is:
private static final Configuration cfg = new Configuration();

Further down the exception-message I find:

Caused by: org.apache.commons.logging.LogConfigurationException:
Invalid class loader hierarchy: You have more than one version of
'org.apache.commons.logging.Log' visible, which is not allowed.

Any hint?
